oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hair"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program for the 1960s counter-culture play by James Rado and Gerome Ragni. Debuting in spring 1989 at MTSU, the Buchanan Players performed this exploration of the sexual revolution.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drama; Theater; Middle Tennessee State University;
